mapper.sql: id, user_id, company_name, legal_person, reg_time, contact_name, contact_mobile_num, business_license, org_code_certificate, tax_registration_certificate, new_business_license, business_license_type, business_license_expire_time, email, legal_person_authority_book, project_scope, description, website, address, certificate_time, certificate_status, status, industry_id, sector_id, province, district, logo, short_name, registered_capital, business_scope, legal_person_idcard, legal_person_idcard_front_url, legal_person_idcard_back_url, business_license_url, org_code_certificate_url, tax_registration_certificate_url, unified_social_credit_code, unified_social_credit_code_url

a.id, user_id, company_name, legal_person, reg_time, contact_name, contact_mobile_num, business_license, org_code_certificate, tax_registration_certificate, new_business_license, business_license_type, business_license_expire_time, email, legal_person_authority_book, project_scope, description, website, address, certificate_time, certificate_status, status, industry_id, sector_id, province, district, logo, short_name, registered_capital, business_scope, legal_person_idcard, legal_person_idcard_front_url, legal_person_idcard_back_url, business_license_url, org_code_certificate_url, tax_registration_certificate_url, unified_social_credit_code, unified_social_credit_code_url
mapper.select:
select
from t_qyzz_bidder where id in (select bidder_id from t_ztgl_bid_invite_bidder where object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select b.id bidderId,b.company_name bidderName,ifnull(u.real_name,'未实名认证') userName,level_name creditLevel from t_qyzz_bidder b left join t_user_auth u on b.user_id = u.user_id left join t_xyjf_bidder_credit c on c.bidder_id = b.id inner join t_xyjf_score_level l on c.credit_score >= l.min_score and c.credit_score < l.max_score where 1=1
and company_name like "%"#{bidderName}"%"
and
company_name like "%"#{item}"%"
limit #{page.firstResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,#{page.pageSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update t_qyzz_bidder
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_mobile_num = #{contactMobileNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_license = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code_certificate = #{orgCodeCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tax_registration_certificate = #{taxRegistrationCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_business_license = #{newBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_license_type = #{businessLicenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_license_expire_time = #{businessLicenseExpireTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person_authority_book = #{legalPersonAuthorityBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_scope = #{projectScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certificate_time = #{certificateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
certificate_status = #{certificateStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sector_id = #{sectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
short_name = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registered_capital = #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_scope = #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person_idcard = #{legalPersonIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person_idcard_front_url = #{legalPersonIdcardFrontUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person_idcard_back_url = #{legalPersonIdcardBackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_license_url = #{businessLicenseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code_certificate_url = #{orgCodeCertificateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tax_registration_certificate_url = #{taxRegistrationCertificateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unified_social_credit_code = #{unifiedSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unified_social_credit_code_url = #{unifiedSocialCreditCodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_qyzz_bidder set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_mobile_num = #{contactMobileNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_license = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_code_certificate = #{orgCodeCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_registration_certificate = #{taxRegistrationCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_business_license = #{newBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_license_type = #{businessLicenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_license_expire_time = #{businessLicenseExpireTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person_authority_book = #{legalPersonAuthorityBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_scope = #{projectScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate_time = #{certificateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, certificate_status = #{certificateStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sector_id = #{sectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, short_name = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_capital = #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_scope = #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person_idcard = #{legalPersonIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person_idcard_front_url = #{legalPersonIdcardFrontUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person_idcard_back_url = tax_registration_certificate_url = #{taxRegistrationCertificateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unified_social_credit_code = #{unifiedSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unified_social_credit_code_url = #{unifiedSocialCreditCodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_qyzz_bidder where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status='OK#'

select
from t_qyzz_bidder where status='OK#'
and company_name like "%"#{queryCertificateListBodyVO.bidderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
limit #{page.firstResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,#{page.pageSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select
from t_qyzz_bidder a INNER JOIN t_tjnr_bidder_recommend b on a.id = b.bidder_id where status='OK#' ORDER BY b.sort_no limit #{begin},#{limit}

select count(a.id) from t_qyzz_bidder a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_bidder_certification b on a.id = b.bidder_id INNER JOIN t_base_certification_type c on b.certification_id = c.id and c.certification_level = 10 where a.status='OK#'

select count(a.id) from t_qyzz_bidder a where a.status='OK#'
and a.company_name like "%"#{bidderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"

select count(a.id) from t_qyzz_bidder a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_bidder_certification b on a.id = b.bidder_id INNER JOIN t_base_certification_type c on b.certification_id = c.id and c.certification_level = 20 where a.status='OK#'
mapper.insert: insert into t_qyzz_bidder(id, user_id, company_name, legal_person, reg_time, contact_name, contact_mobile_num, business_license, org_code_certificate, tax_registration_certificate, new_business_license, business_license_type, business_license_expire_time, email, legal_person_authority_book, project_scope, description, website, address, industry_id, sector_id, province, district, logo, short_name, registered_capital, business_scope, legal_person_idcard, legal_person_idcard_front_url, legal_person_idcard_back_url, business_license_url, org_code_certificate_url, tax_registration_certificate_url, unified_social_credit_code, unified_social_credit_code_url,certificate_time, certificate_status,status) select a.id, a.user_id, a.company_name, a.legal_person, a.reg_time, a.contact_name, a.contact_mobile_num, a.business_license, a.org_code_certificate, a.tax_registration_certificate, a.new_business_license, a.business_license_type, a.business_license_expire_time, a.email, a.legal_person_authority_book, a.project_scope, a.description, a.website, a.address, a.industry_id, a.sector_id, a.province, a.district, a.logo, a.short_name, a.registered_capital, a.business_scope, a.legal_person_idcard, a.legal_person_idcard_front_url, a.legal_person_idcard_back_url, a.business_license_url, a.org_code_certificate_url, a.tax_registration_certificate_url, a.unified_social_credit_code, a.unified_social_credit_code_url,now(),'OK#','OK#' FROM t_qyzz_bidder_certicate a where a.id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update t_qyzz_bidder a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_bidder_certicate b ON a.id = b.id set a.id = b.id, a.user_id = b.user_id, a.company_name = b.company_name, a.legal_person = b.legal_person, a.reg_time = b.reg_time, a.contact_name = b.contact_name, a.contact_mobile_num = b.contact_mobile_num, a.business_license = b.business_license, a.org_code_certificate = b.org_code_certificate, a.tax_registration_certificate = b.tax_registration_certificate, a.new_business_license = b.new_business_license, a.business_license_type = b.business_license_type, a.business_license_expire_time = b.business_license_expire_time, a.legal_person_idcard = b.legal_person_idcard, a.legal_person_idcard_front_url = b.legal_person_idcard_front_url, a.email = b.email, a.legal_person_authority_book = b.legal_person_authority_book, a.project_scope = b.project_scope, a.description = b.description, a.website = b.website, a.address = b.address, a.industry_id = b.industry_id, a.sector_id = b.sector_id, a.province = b.province, a.district = b.district, a.logo = b.logo, a.short_name = b.short_name, a.registered_capital = b.registered_capital, a.business_scope = b.business_scope, a.legal_person_idcard_back_url = b.legal_person_idcard_back_url, a.business_license_url = b.business_license_url, a.org_code_certificate_url = b.org_code_certificate_url, a.tax_registration_certificate_url = b.tax_registration_certificate_url, a.unified_social_credit_code = b.unified_social_credit_code, a.unified_social_credit_code_url = b.unified_social_credit_code_url,a.certificate_time = now(), a.certificate_status = 'OK#',a.status = 'OK#' where b.id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT mm.*,f.level_name evaluationRating from(select a.id,a.company_name companyName,a.logo logoUrl,e.level_name creditRating,b.credit_score creditScore,IFNULL(sum(c.score),0) evaluationScore from t_qyzz_biddee a LEFT JOIN t_xyjf_bidder_credit b on b.bidder_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_gcgl_project_evaluation_bidder c on a.id = c.bidder_id LEFT JOIN t_xyjf_score_level e on (b.credit_score >e.min_score and b.credit_score <e.max_score))mm LEFT JOIN t_xyjf_score_level f on (mm.evaluationScore >f.min_score and mm.evaluationScore <f.max_score) where mm.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
